mapper.select: SELECT w.wish_list_id as id, w.user_id as userId, w.item_id as productId, COALESCE(i.name, '상품명') as productName, COALESCE(i.image, '/images/no-image.jpg') as productImage, COALESCE(i.description, '상품 설명이 없습니다.') as productDescription, COALESCE(i.price, 0) as productPrice FROM wish_list w LEFT JOIN item i ON w.item_id = i.item_id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY w.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wish_list (user_id, item_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{itemId}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wish_list WHERE wish_list_id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
